quote: Success is getting and achieving what you want. Happiness is wanting and being content with what you get.
author: Bernard Meltzer

quote: Friendship improves happiness and abates misery, by the doubling of our joy and the dividing of our grief.
author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: Success is getting what you want. Happiness is liking what you get.

quote: I've made an odd discovery. Every time I talk to a savant I feel quite sure that happiness is no longer a possibility. Yet when I talk with my gardener, I'm convinced of the opposite.

quote: Be more dedicated to making solid achievements than in running after swift but synthetic happiness.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: I have learned to seek my happiness by limiting my desires, rather than in attempting to satisfy them.
author: John Stuart Mill

quote: A table, a chair, a bowl of fruit and a violin; what else does a man need to be happy?

quote: The most worth-while thing is to try to put happiness into the lives of others.

quote: The first requisite for the happiness of the people is the abolition of religion.

quote: Happiness is beneficial for the body, but it is grief that develops the powers of the mind.

quote: The true basis of morality is utility; that is, the adaptation of our actions to the promotion of the general welfare and happiness; the endeavour so to rule our lives that we may serve and bless mankind.

quote: Independence is happiness.

quote: For happiness one needs security, but joy can spring like a flower even from the cliffs of despair.

quote: Happiness often sneaks in through a door you didn't know you left open.

quote: Being of service to others is what brings true happiness.

quote: Money can't buy you happiness, but it can buy you a yacht big enough to pull up right alongside it.

quote: Be happy for this moment. This moment is your life.
author: Omar Khayyam

quote: Happiness is a choice. You can choose to be happy. There's going to be stress in life, but it's your choice whether you let it affect you or not.
author: Valerie Bertinelli

quote: Some days are just bad days, that's all. You have to experience sadness to know happiness, and I remind myself that not every day is going to be a good day, that's just the way it is!
author: Dita Von Teese

quote: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.
author: Albert Schweitzer

quote: Let us never know what old age is. Let us know the happiness time brings, not count the years.
author: Ausonius

quote: To enjoy good health, to bring true happiness to one's family, to bring peace to all, one must first discipline and control one's own mind. If a man can control his mind he can find the way to Enlightenment, and all wisdom and virtue will naturally come to him.

quote: The best way to pay for a lovely moment is to enjoy it.

quote: Friends show their love in times of trouble, not in happiness.
author: Euripides

quote: A smile is happiness you'll find right under your nose.

quote: Thousands of candles can be lighted from a single candle, and the life of the candle will not be shortened. Happiness never decreases by being shared.

quote: Happiness lies in the joy of achievement and the thrill of creative effort.

quote: The secret to happiness is freedom... And the secret to freedom is courage.

quote: Every day is a new day, and you'll never be able to find happiness if you don't move on.

quote: Every day we have plenty of opportunities to get angry, stressed or offended. But what you're doing when you indulge these negative emotions is giving something outside yourself power over your happiness. You can choose to not let little things upset you.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: Happiness radiates like the fragrance from a flower and draws all good things towards you.
author: Maharishi Mahesh Yogi

quote: Happiness is having a large, loving, caring, close-knit family in another city.
author: George Burns

quote: Love is when the other person's happiness is more important than your own.
author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: Happiness cannot be traveled to, owned, earned, worn or consumed. Happiness is the spiritual experience of living every minute with love, grace, and gratitude.
author: Denis Waitley

quote: The most simple things can bring the most happiness.
author: Izabella Scorupco

quote: Happiness doesn't depend on any external conditions, it is governed by our mental attitude.

quote: My greatest beauty secret is being happy with myself. I don't use special creams or treatments - I'll use a little bit of everything. It's a mistake to think you are what you put on yourself. quote: It is not how much we have, but how much we enjoy, that makes happiness.
author: Charles Spurgeon

quote: I love walking down the street and seeing faces and drama and happiness and sadness and dirt and cleanliness.
author: Ric Ocasek

quote: I enjoy being happy every day, and hopefully you can hear my happiness in my music. Life is beautiful.
author: Christina Milian

quote: I refuse to accept other people's ideas of happiness for me. As if there's a 'one size fits all' standard for happiness.
author: Kanye West

quote: All you need for happiness is a good gun, a good horse, and a good wife.
author: Daniel Boone

quote: Problems or successes, they all are the results of our own actions. Karma. The philosophy of action is that no one else is the giver of peace or happiness. One's own karma, one's own actions are responsible to come to bring either happiness or success or whatever.
author: Maharishi Mahesh Yogi

quote: Some cause happiness wherever they go; others whenever they go.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Your success and happiness lies in you. Resolve to keep happy, and your joy and you shall form an invincible host against difficulties.
author: Helen Keller

quote: Nothing brings me more happiness than trying to help the most vulnerable people in society. It is a goal and an essential part of my life - a kind of destiny. Whoever is in distress can call on me. I will come running wherever they are.
author: Princess Diana

quote: The measure of success is happiness and peace of mind.
author: Bobby Davro

quote: There is no greater sorrow than to recall happiness in times of misery.
author: Dante Alighieri

quote: Three grand essentials to happiness in this life are something to do, something to love, and something to hope for.
author: Joseph Addison

quote: Happiness is like a cloud, if you stare at it long enough, it evaporates.
author: Sarah McLachlan

quote: A contented mind is the greatest blessing a man can enjoy in this world.
author: Joseph Addison

quote: Happiness depends upon ourselves.
author: Aristotle

quote: True happiness arises, in the first place, from the enjoyment of one's self, and in the next, from the friendship and conversation of a few select companions.
author: Joseph Addison

quote: Self-esteem is as important to our well-being as legs are to a table. It is essential for physical and mental health and for happiness.
author: Louise Hart

quote: The art of being happy lies in the power of extracting happiness from common things.
author: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: There is a difference between happiness and wisdom: he that thinks himself the happiest man is really so; but he that thinks himself the wisest is generally the greatest fool.
author: Francis Bacon

quote: Procrastination is one of the most common and deadliest of diseases and its toll on success and happiness is heavy.
author: Wayne Gretzky

quote: Our greatest happiness does not depend on the condition of life in which chance has placed us, but is always the result of a good conscience, good health, occupation, and freedom in all just pursuits.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: Getting married, for me, was the best thing I ever did. I was suddenly beset with an immense sense of release, that we have something more important than our separate selves, and that is the marriage. There's immense happiness that can come from working towards that.
author: Nick Cave

quote: The happiness of life is made up of minute fractions - the little, soon forgotten charities of a kiss or a smile, a kind look or heartfelt compliment.
author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quote: I am a spiritual person in an eastern religion kind of way. I learned that happiness for all of us is a switch that you flick in your brain. It doesn't have anything to do with getting a new house, a new car, a new girlfriend, or a new pair of shoes. Our culture is very much about that; we are never happy with what we have today.
author: Tom Ford

quote: Joy can only be real if people look upon their life as a service and have a definite object in life outside themselves and their personal happiness.
author: Leo Tolstoy

quote: The greater part of our happiness or misery depends on our dispositions and not our circumstances.
author: Martha Washington

quote: The two enemies of human happiness are pain and boredom.

author: Joseph Addison

quote: Happiness depends upon ourselves.
author: Aristotle

quote: True happiness arises, in the first place, from the enjoyment of one's self, and in the next, from the friendship and conversation of a few select companions.
author: Joseph Addison

quote: Self-esteem is as important to our well-being as legs are to a table. It is essential for physical and mental health and for happiness.
author: Louise Hart

quote: The art of being happy lies in the power of extracting happiness from common things.
author: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: There is a difference between happiness and wisdom: he that thinks himself the happiest man is really so; but he that thinks himself the wisest is generally the greatest fool.
author: Francis Bacon

quote: Procrastination is one of the most common and deadliest of diseases and its toll on success and happiness is heavy.
author: Wayne Gretzky

quote: Our greatest happiness does not depend on the condition of life in which chance has placed us, but is always the result of a good conscience, good health, occupation, and freedom in all just pursuits.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: Getting married, for me, was the best thing I ever did. I was suddenly beset with an immense sense of release, that we have something more important than our separate selves, and that is the marriage. There's immense happiness that can come from working towards that.
author: Nick Cave

quote: The happiness of life is made up of minute fractions - the little, soon forgotten charities of a kiss or a smile, a kind look or heartfelt compliment.
author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quote: I am a spiritual person in an eastern religion kind of way. I learned that happiness for all of us is a switch that you flick in your brain. It doesn't have anything to do with getting a new house, a new car, a new girlfriend, or a new pair of shoes. Our culture is very much about that; we are never happy with what we have today.
author: Tom Ford

quote: Joy can only be real if people look upon their life as a service and have a definite object in life outside themselves and their personal happiness.
author: Leo Tolstoy

quote: The greater part of our happiness or misery depends on our dispositions and not our circumstances.
author: Martha Washington

quote: The two enemies of human happiness are pain and boredom.
author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quote: The happiness of society is the end of government.
author: John Adams

quote: We're taught to be ashamed of confusion, anger, fear and sadness, and to me they're of equal value to happiness, excitement and inspiration.
author: Alanis Morissette

quote: Happiness is an attitude of mind, born of the simple determination to be happy under all outward circumstances.
author: J. Donald Walters

quote: I've realized through the years that I just find happiness in other things, whether it's my dogs or my friends or, like, looking at the sunset. So if I were to wish for something else, it would just to be happy all the time, to have a superpower of not letting things affect me, and to be true to who I am, always.
author: Kylie Jenner

quote: Completeness? Happiness? These words don't come close to describing my emotions. There truly is nothing I can say to capture what motherhood means to me, particularly given my medical history.
author: Anita Baker

quote: Happiness is dependent on self-discipline. We are the biggest obstacles to our own happiness. It is much easier to do battle with society and with others than to fight our own nature.
author: Dennis Prager

quote: True happiness involves the full use of one's power and talents.
author: John W. Gardner

quote: If you are happy, you can give happiness. If you don't love yourself and if you are unhappy with yourself, you can't give anything else but that.
author: Gisele Bundchen

quote: When a small child, I thought that success spelled happiness. I was wrong, happiness is like a butterfly which appears and delights us for one brief moment, but soon flits away.
author: Anna Pavlova

quote: A happy life must be to a great extent a quiet life, for it is only in an atmosphere of quiet that true joy dare live.
author: Bertrand Russell

quote: God cannot give us a happiness and peace apart from Himself, because it is not there. There is no such thing.
author: C. S. Lewis

quote: We never taste happiness in perfection, our most fortunate successes are mixed with sadness.
author: Pierre Corneille

quote: It's not possible to experience constant euphoria, but if you're grateful, you can find happiness in everything.
author: Pharrell Williams

quote: We all want to help one another. Human beings are like that. We want to live by each other's happiness, not by each other's misery.
author: Charlie Chaplin

quote: In a storm of struggles, I have tried to control the elements, clasp the fist tight so as to protect self and happiness. But stress can be an addiction, and worry can be our lunge for control, and we forget the answer to this moment is always yes because of Christ.
author: Ann Voskamp

quote: It is very important to generate a good attitude, a good heart, as much as possible. From this, happiness in both the short term and the long term for both yourself and others will come.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: True happiness comes from the joy of deeds well done, the zest of creating things new.
author: Antoine de Saint-Exupery

quote: To me, flowers are happiness.
author: Stefano Gabbana

quote: Happiness is only real when shared.
author: Christopher McCandless

quote: The said truth is that it is the greatest happiness of the greatest number that is the measure of right and wrong.
author: Jeremy Bentham

quote: No man chooses evil because it is evil; he only mistakes it for happiness, the good he seeks.
author: Mary Wollstonecraft

quote: Although the skills aren't hard to learn, finding the happiness and finding the satisfaction and finding fulfillment in continuously serving somebody else something good to eat, is what makes a really good restaurant.
author: Mario Batali

quote: The white man's happiness cannot be purchased by the black man's misery.
author: Frederick Douglass

quote: A great man does not seek applause or place; he seeks for truth; he seeks the road to happiness, and what he ascertains, he gives to others.
author: Robert Green Ingersoll

quote: Happiness is nothing but temporary moments here and there - and I love those. But I would be bored out of my mind if I were happy all the time.
author: Zoe Saldana

quote: When you're happy you find pure joy in your life. There are no regrets in this state of happiness - and that's a goal worth striving for in all areas of your life.
author: Suze Orman

quote: Only one thing has to change for us to know happiness in our lives: where we focus our attention.
author: Greg Anderson

quote: Success is getting and achieving what you want. Happiness is wanting and being content with what you get.
author: Bernard Meltzer

quote: Friendship improves happiness and abates misery, by the doubling of our joy and the dividing of our grief.
author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: Success is getting what you want. Happiness is liking what you get.
author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: I've made an odd discovery. Every time I talk to a savant I feel quite sure that happiness is no longer a possibility. Yet when I talk with my gardener, I'm convinced of the opposite.
author: Bertrand Russell

quote: Be more dedicated to making solid achievements than in running after swift but synthetic happiness.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: I have learned to seek my happiness by limiting my desires, rather than in attempting to satisfy them.
author: John Stuart Mill

quote: A table, a chair, a bowl of fruit and a violin; what else does a man need to be happy?
author: Albert Einstein

quote: The most worth-while thing is to try to put happiness into the lives of others.
author: Robert Baden-Powell

quote: The first requisite for the happiness of the people is the abolition of religion.
author: Karl Marx

quote: You do the right thing even if it makes you feel bad. The purpose of life is not to be happy but to be worthy of happiness.
author: Tracy Kidder

quote: Happiness is beneficial for the body, but it is grief that develops the powers of the mind.
author: Marcel Proust

quote: The true basis of morality is utility; that is, the adaptation of our actions to the promotion of the general welfare and happiness; the endeavour so to rule our lives that we may serve and bless mankind.
author: Annie Besant

quote: Happiness is within. It has nothing to do with how much applause you get or how many people praise you. Happiness comes when you believe that you have done something truly meaningful.
author: Martin Yan

quote: Independence is happiness.
author: Susan B. Anthony

quote: For happiness one needs security, but joy can spring like a flower even from the cliffs of despair.
author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quote: Happiness often sneaks in through a door you didn't know you left open.
author: John Barrymore

quote: Being happy is of the utmost importance. Success in anything is through happiness.
author: Maharishi Mahesh Yogi

quote: Being of service to others is what brings true happiness.
author: Marie Osmond

quote: It's OK to have a plan, to invest in your future - for your financial security, your love life, your personal fulfillment, and even your happiness. To have personal happiness as a stated goal doesn't detract from it if you get there.
author: Karen Finerman

quote: Some people think happiness is a luxury, but it's a necessity. You need to make space for it in your life.
author: Christie Brinkley

quote: Money can't buy you happiness, but it can buy you a yacht big enough to pull up right alongside it.
author: David Lee Roth

quote: We are buried beneath the weight of information, which is being confused with knowledge; quantity is being confused with abundance and wealth with happiness.
author: Tom Waits

quote: One of the first conditions of happiness is that the link between Man and Nature shall not be broken.
author: Leo Tolstoy

quote: Happiness is the only thing worth fighting for in your life.
author: Lilly Singh

quote: I'm a very positive person. My grandmother taught me that happiness is both a skill and a decision, and you are responsible for the outcome.
author: Helen McCrory

quote: There is only one happiness in this life, to love and be loved.
author: George Sand

quote: Happiness is not something you postpone for the future; it is something you design for the present.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Today I choose life. Every morning when I wake up I can choose joy, happiness, negativity, pain... To feel the freedom that comes from being able to continue to make mistakes and choices - today I choose to feel life, not to deny my humanity but embrace it.
author: Kevyn Aucoin

quote: Be happy for this moment. This moment is your life.
author: Omar Khayyam

quote: Happiness is a choice. You can choose to be happy. There's going to be stress in life, but it's your choice whether you let it affect you or not.
author: Valerie Bertinelli

quote: Some days are just bad days, that's all. You have to experience sadness to know happiness, and I remind myself that not every day is going to be a good day, that's just the way it is!
author: Dita Von Teese

quote: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.
author: Albert Schweitzer

quote: Let us never know what old age is. Let us know the happiness time brings, not count the years.
author: Ausonius

quote: To enjoy good health, to bring true happiness to one's family, to bring peace to all, one must first discipline and control one's own mind. If a man can control his mind he can find the way to Enlightenment, and all wisdom and virtue will naturally come to him.
author: Buddha

quote: The best way to pay for a lovely moment is to enjoy it.
author: Richard Bach

quote: Friends show their love in times of trouble, not in happiness.
author: Euripides

quote: A smile is happiness you'll find right under your nose.
author: Tom Wilson

quote: Thousands of candles can be lighted from a single candle, and the life of the candle will not be shortened. Happiness never decreases by being shared.
author: Buddha

quote: Happiness lies in the joy of achievement and the thrill of creative effort.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: The secret to happiness is freedom... And the secret to freedom is courage.
author: Thucydides

quote: Every day is a new day, and you'll never be able to find happiness if you don't move on.
author: Carrie Underwood

quote: Every day we have plenty of opportunities to get angry, stressed or offended. But what you're doing when you indulge these negative emotions is giving something outside yourself power over your happiness. You can choose to not let little things upset you.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: Happiness radiates like the fragrance from a flower and draws all good things towards you.
author: Maharishi Mahesh Yogi

quote: Happiness is having a large, loving, caring, close-knit family in another city.
author: George Burns

quote: Love is when the other person's happiness is more important than your own.
author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: Happiness cannot be traveled to, owned, earned, worn or consumed. Happiness is the spiritual experience of living every minute with love, grace, and gratitude.
author: Denis Waitley

quote: The most simple things can bring the most happiness.
author: Izabella Scorupco

quote: Happiness doesn't depend on any external conditions, it is governed by our mental attitude.
author: Dale Carnegie

quote: My greatest beauty secret is being happy with myself. I don't use special creams or treatments - I'll use a little bit of everything. It's a mistake to think you are what you put on yourself. I believe that a lot of how you look is to do with how you feel about yourself and your life. Happiness is the greatest beauty secret.
author: Tina Turner

quote: A grateful heart is a beginning of greatness. It is an expression of humility. It is a foundation for the development of such virtues as prayer, faith, courage, contentment, happiness, love, and well-being.
author: James E. Faust

quote: It is not how much we have, but how much we enjoy, that makes happiness.
author: Charles Spurgeon

quote: I love walking down the street and seeing faces and drama and happiness and sadness and dirt and cleanliness.
author: Ric Ocasek

quote: I enjoy being happy every day, and hopefully you can hear my happiness in my music. Life is beautiful.
author: Christina Milian

quote: I refuse to accept other people's ideas of happiness for me. As if there's a 'one size fits all' standard for happiness.
author: Kanye West

quote: All you need for happiness is a good gun, a good horse, and a good wife.
author: Daniel Boone

quote: Problems or successes, they all are the results of our own actions. Karma. The philosophy of action is that no one else is the giver of peace or happiness. One's own karma, one's own actions are responsible to come to bring either happiness or success or whatever.
author: Maharishi Mahesh Yogi

quote: Some cause happiness wherever they go; others whenever they go.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Your success and happiness lies in you. Resolve to keep happy, and your joy and you shall form an invincible host against difficulties.
author: Helen Keller

quote: Nothing brings me more happiness than trying to help the most vulnerable people in society. It is a goal and an essential part of my life - a kind of destiny. Whoever is in distress can call on me. I will come running wherever they are.
author: Princess Diana

quote: The measure of success is happiness and peace of mind.
author: Bobby Davro

quote: There is no greater sorrow than to recall happiness in times of misery.
author: Dante Alighieri

quote: Three grand essentials to happiness in this life are something to do, something to love, and something to hope for.
author: Joseph Addison

quote: Happiness is like a cloud, if you stare at it long enough, it evaporates.
author: Sarah McLachlan

quote: A contented mind is the greatest blessing a man can enjoy in this world.

quote: Love is trembling happiness.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: It was as if all of the happiness, all of the magic of this blissful hour had flowed together into these stirring, bittersweet tones and flowed away, becoming temporal and transitory once more.
author: Herman Hesse

quote: I keep mementos from everything I've done. I've got my cab driver's license from 'Happiness.' I've got a pair of glasses and a belt buckle from playing John Lennon. I've got a pair of sunglasses from playing Andy Warhol... It's all in a box in the garage.
author: Jared Harris

quote: As a teenager, rather than setting myself on a course to pursue fame (quite common growing up in L.A., the entertainment capital of the world), happiness, fulfillment, and spiritual enlightenment (also quite common), I skipped right on to trying to be successful. 'Let's just get on with it,' I felt. 'Onward' became my motto.
author: Karen Finerman

quote: What we call happiness in the strictest sense comes from the (preferably sudden) satisfaction of needs which have been dammed up to a high degree.
author: Sigmund Freud

quote: Joe E. Lewis said, 'Money doesn't buy happiness but it calms the nerves.' And that is how I feel about a film being well-received.
author: Alexander Payne

quote: Just as a cautious businessman avoids investing all his capital in one concern, so wisdom would probably admonish us also not to anticipate all our happiness from one quarter alone.
author: Sigmund Freud

quote: Life finds its purpose and fulfillment in the expansion of happiness.
author: Maharishi Mahesh Yogi

quote: In the scope of a happy life, a messy desk or an overstuffed coat closet is a trivial thing, yet I find - and I hear from other people that they agree - that getting rid of clutter gives a disproportionate boost to happiness.
author: Gretchen Rubin

quote: I wish I could throw off the thoughts which poison my happiness, but I take a kind of pleasure in indulging them.
author: Frederic Chopin

quote: I think you can be depressed and flourish, I think you can have cancer and flourish, I think you can be divorced and flourish. When we believed that happiness was only smiling and good mood, that wasn't very good for people like me, people in the lower half of positive affectivity.
author: Martin Seligman

quote: It is the true duty of every man to promote the happiness of his fellow creatures to the utmost of his power.
author: William Wilberforce

quote: Happiness is like a cat, If you try to coax it or call it, it will avoid you; it will never come. But if you pay not attention to it and go about your business, you'll find it rubbing against your legs and jumping into your lap.
author: William Bennett

quote: I'm not motivated by money or power or fame. In the end, it doesn't bring much happiness. The only thing that is driving me is self-satisfaction, self-validation.
author: William Clay Ford, Jr.

quote: If you ever find happiness by hunting for it, you will find it, as the old woman did her lost spectacles, safe on her own nose all the time.
author: Josh Billings

quote: Fashion is all about happiness. It's fun. It's important. But it's not medicine.
author: Donatella Versace

quote: Life is essentially a cheat and its conditions are those of defeat; the redeeming things are not happiness and pleasure but the deeper satisfactions that come out of struggle.
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quote: When what we are is what we want to be, that's happiness.
author: Malcolm Forbes

quote: Most of us believe in trying to make other people happy only if they can be happy in ways which we approve.
author: Robert Staughton Lynd

quote: Happiness always looks small while you hold it in your hands, but let it go, and you learn at once how big and precious it is.
author: Maxim Gorky

quote: The man who is aware of himself is henceforward independent; and he is never bored, and life is only too short, and he is steeped through and through with a profound yet temperate happiness.
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: As long as you are being true to yourself, you will always find happiness.
author: Amber Riley

quote: The secular world looks to the church and to its chagrin, finds no love, no life, no laughter, no hope and no happiness.
author: Rod Parsley

quote: I think the pursuit of happiness is the pursuit of reality because illusion never leaves us ultimately happy.
author: Parker Palmer

quote: We must have courage to bet on our ideas, to take the calculated risk, and to act. Everyday living requires courage if life is to be effective and bring happiness.
author: Maxwell Maltz

quote: No man is happy without a delusion of some kind. Delusions are as necessary to our happiness as realities.
author: Christian Nestell Bovee

quote: Only one thing has to change for us to know happiness in our lives: where we focus our attention.

quote: To enjoy good health, to bring true happiness to one's family, to bring peace to all, one must first discipline and control one's own mind. If a man can control his mind he can find the way to Enlightenment, and all wisdom and virtue will naturally come to him.
author: Buddha

quote: The best way to pay for a lovely moment is to enjoy it.
author: Richard Bach

quote: Friends show their love in times of trouble, not in happiness.
author: Euripides

quote: A smile is happiness you'll find right under your nose.
author: Tom Wilson

quote: Thousands of candles can be lighted from a single candle, and the life of the candle will not be shortened. Happiness never decreases by being shared.
author: Buddha

quote: Happiness lies in the joy of achievement and the thrill of creative effort.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: The secret to happiness is freedom... And the secret to freedom is courage.
author: Thucydides

quote: Every day is a new day, and you'll never be able to find happiness if you don't move on.
author: Carrie Underwood

quote: Every day we have plenty of opportunities to get angry, stressed or offended. But what you're doing when you indulge these negative emotions is giving something outside yourself power over your happiness. You can choose to not let little things upset you.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: Happiness radiates like the fragrance from a flower and draws all good things towards you.
author: Maharishi Mahesh Yogi

quote: Happiness is having a large, loving, caring, close-knit family in another city.
author: George Burns

quote: Love is when the other person's happiness is more important than your own.
author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: Happiness cannot be traveled to, owned, earned, worn or consumed. Happiness is the spiritual experience of living every minute with love, grace, and gratitude.
author: Denis Waitley

quote: The most simple things can bring the most happiness.
author: Izabella Scorupco

quote: Happiness doesn't depend on any external conditions, it is governed by our mental attitude.
author: Dale Carnegie

quote: My greatest beauty secret is being happy with myself. I don't use special creams or treatments - I'll use a little bit of everything. It's a mistake to think you are what you put on yourself. I believe that a lot of how you look is to do with how you feel about yourself and your life. Happiness is the greatest beauty secret.
author: Tina Turner

quote: A grateful heart is a beginning of greatness. It is an expression of humility. It is a foundation for the development of such virtues as prayer, faith, courage, contentment, happiness, love, and well-being.
author: James E. Faust

quote: It is not how much we have, but how much we enjoy, that makes happiness.
author: Charles Spurgeon

quote: I love walking down the street and seeing faces and drama and happiness and sadness and dirt and cleanliness.
author: Ric Ocasek

quote: I enjoy being happy every day, and hopefully you can hear my happiness in my music. Life is beautiful.
author: Christina Milian

quote: I refuse to accept other people's ideas of happiness for me. As if there's a 'one size fits all' standard for happiness.
author: Kanye West

quote: All you need for happiness is a good gun, a good horse, and a good wife.
author: Daniel Boone

quote: Problems or successes, they all are the results of our own actions. Karma. The philosophy of action is that no one else is the giver of peace or happiness. One's own karma, one's own actions are responsible to come to bring either happiness or success or whatever.
author: Maharishi Mahesh Yogi

quote: Some cause happiness wherever they go; others whenever they go.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Your success and happiness lies in you. Resolve to keep happy, and your joy and you shall form an invincible host against difficulties.
author: Helen Keller

quote: Nothing brings me more happiness than trying to help the most vulnerable people in society. It is a goal and an essential part of my life - a kind of destiny. Whoever is in distress can call on me. I will come running wherever they are.
author: Princess Diana

quote: The measure of success is happiness and peace of mind.
author: Bobby Davro

quote: There is no greater sorrow than to recall happiness in times of misery.
author: Dante Alighieri

quote: Three grand essentials to happiness in this life are something to do, something to love, and something to hope for.
author: Joseph Addison

quote: Happiness is like a cloud, if you stare at it long enough, it evaporates.
author: Sarah McLachlan

quote: A contented mind is the greatest blessing a man can enjoy in this world.
author: Joseph Addison

quote: Happiness depends upon ourselves.
author: Aristotle

quote: True happiness arises, in the first place, from the enjoyment of one's self, and in the next, from the friendship and conversation of a few select companions.
author: Joseph Addison

quote: Self-esteem is as important to our well-being as legs are to a table. It is essential for physical and mental health and for happiness.
author: Louise Hart

quote: The art of being happy lies in the power of extracting happiness from common things.
author: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: There is a difference between happiness and wisdom: he that thinks himself the happiest man is really so; but he that thinks himself the wisest is generally the greatest fool.
author: Francis Bacon

quote: Procrastination is one of the most common and deadliest of diseases and its toll on success and happiness is heavy.
author: Wayne Gretzky

quote: Our greatest happiness does not depend on the condition of life in which chance has placed us, but is always the result of a good conscience, good health, occupation, and freedom in all just pursuits.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: Getting married, for me, was the best thing I ever did. I was suddenly beset with an immense sense of release, that we have something more important than our separate selves, and that is the marriage. There's immense happiness that can come from working towards that.
author: Nick Cave

quote: The happiness of life is made up of minute fractions - the little, soon forgotten charities of a kiss or a smile, a kind look or heartfelt compliment.
author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quote: I am a spiritual person in an eastern religion kind of way. I learned that happiness for all of us is a switch that you flick in your brain. It doesn't have anything to do with getting a new house, a new car, a new girlfriend, or a new pair of shoes. Our culture is very much about that; we are never happy with what we have today.
author: Tom Ford

quote: Joy can only be real if people look upon their life as a service and have a definite object in life outside themselves and their personal happiness.
author: Leo Tolstoy

quote: The greater part of our happiness or misery depends on our dispositions and not our circumstances.
author: Martha Washington

quote: The two enemies of human happiness are pain and boredom.
author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quote: The happiness of society is the end of government.
author: John Adams

quote: We're taught to be ashamed of confusion, anger, fear and sadness, and to me they're of equal value to happiness, excitement and inspiration.
author: Alanis Morissette

quote: Happiness is an attitude of mind, born of the simple determination to be happy under all outward circumstances.
author: J. Donald Walters

quote: I've realized through the years that I just find happiness in other things, whether it's my dogs or my friends or, like, looking at the sunset. So if I were to wish for something else, it would just to be happy all the time, to have a superpower of not letting things affect me, and to be true to who I am, always.
author: Kylie Jenner

quote: Completeness? Happiness? These words don't come close to describing my emotions. There truly is nothing I can say to capture what motherhood means to me, particularly given my medical history.
author: Anita Baker

quote: Happiness is dependent on self-discipline. We are the biggest obstacles to our own happiness. It is much easier to do battle with society and with others than to fight our own nature.
author: Dennis Prager

quote: True happiness involves the full use of one's power and talents.
author: John W. Gardner

quote: If you are happy, you can give happiness. If you don't love yourself and if you are unhappy with yourself, you can't give anything else but that.
author: Gisele Bundchen

quote: When a small child, I thought that success spelled happiness. I was wrong, happiness is like a butterfly which appears and delights us for one brief moment, but soon flits away.
author: Anna Pavlova

quote: A happy life must be to a great extent a quiet life, for it is only in an atmosphere of quiet that true joy dare live.
author: Bertrand Russell

quote: God cannot give us a happiness and peace apart from Himself, because it is not there. There is no such thing.
author: C. S. Lewis

quote: We never taste happiness in perfection, our most fortunate successes are mixed with sadness.
author: Pierre Corneille

quote: It's not possible to experience constant euphoria, but if you're grateful, you can find happiness in everything.
author: Pharrell Williams

quote: We all want to help one another. Human beings are like that. We want to live by each other's happiness, not by each other's misery.
author: Charlie Chaplin

quote: In a storm of struggles, I have tried to control the elements, clasp the fist tight so as to protect self and happiness. But stress can be an addiction, and worry can be our lunge for control, and we forget the answer to this moment is always yes because of Christ.
author: Ann Voskamp

quote: It is very important to generate a good attitude, a good heart, as much as possible. From this, happiness in both the short term and the long term for both yourself and others will come.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: True happiness comes from the joy of deeds well done, the zest of creating things new.
author: Antoine de Saint-Exupery

quote: To me, flowers are happiness.
author: Stefano Gabbana

quote: Happiness is only real when shared.
author: Christopher McCandless

quote: The said truth is that it is the greatest happiness of the greatest number that is the measure of right and wrong.
author: Jeremy Bentham

quote: No man chooses evil because it is evil; he only mistakes it for happiness, the good he seeks.
author: Mary Wollstonecraft

quote: Although the skills aren't hard to learn, finding the happiness and finding the satisfaction and finding fulfillment in continuously serving somebody else something good to eat, is what makes a really good restaurant.
author: Mario Batali

quote: The white man's happiness cannot be purchased by the black man's misery.
author: Frederick Douglass

quote: A great man does not seek applause or place; he seeks for truth; he seeks the road to happiness, and what he ascertains, he gives to others.
author: Robert Green Ingersoll

quote: Happiness is nothing but temporary moments here and there - and I love those. But I would be bored out of my mind if I were happy all the time.
author: Zoe Saldana

quote: When you're happy you find pure joy in your life. There are no regrets in this state of happiness - and that's a goal worth striving for in all areas of your life.
author: Suze Orman

quote: Love is trembling happiness.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: It was as if all of the happiness, all of the magic of this blissful hour had flowed together into these stirring, bittersweet tones and flowed away, becoming temporal and transitory once more.
author: Herman Hesse

quote: I keep mementos from everything I've done. I've got my cab driver's license from 'Happiness.' I've got a pair of glasses and a belt buckle from playing John Lennon. I've got a pair of sunglasses from playing Andy Warhol... It's all in a box in the garage.
author: Jared Harris

quote: As a teenager, rather than setting myself on a course to pursue fame (quite common growing up in L.A., the entertainment capital of the world), happiness, fulfillment, and spiritual enlightenment (also quite common), I skipped right on to trying to be successful. 'Let's just get on with it,' I felt. 'Onward' became my motto.
author: Karen Finerman

quote: What we call happiness in the strictest sense comes from the (preferably sudden) satisfaction of needs which have been dammed up to a high degree.
author: Sigmund Freud

quote: Joe E. Lewis said, 'Money doesn't buy happiness but it calms the nerves.' And that is how I feel about a film being well-received.
author: Alexander Payne

quote: Just as a cautious businessman avoids investing all his capital in one concern, so wisdom would probably admonish us also not to anticipate all our happiness from one quarter alone.
author: Sigmund Freud

quote: Life finds its purpose and fulfillment in the expansion of happiness.
author: Maharishi Mahesh Yogi

quote: In the scope of a happy life, a messy desk or an overstuffed coat closet is a trivial thing, yet I find - and I hear from other people that they agree - that getting rid of clutter gives a disproportionate boost to happiness.
author: Gretchen Rubin

quote: I wish I could throw off the thoughts which poison my happiness, but I take a kind of pleasure in indulging them.
author: Frederic Chopin

quote: I think you can be depressed and flourish, I think you can have cancer and flourish, I think you can be divorced and flourish. When we believed that happiness was only smiling and good mood, that wasn't very good for people like me, people in the lower half of positive affectivity.
author: Martin Seligman

quote: It is the true duty of every man to promote the happiness of his fellow creatures to the utmost of his power.
author: William Wilberforce

quote: Happiness is like a cat, If you try to coax it or call it, it will avoid you; it will never come. But if you pay not attention to it and go about your business, you'll find it rubbing against your legs and jumping into your lap.
author: William Bennett

quote: I'm not motivated by money or power or fame. In the end, it doesn't bring much happiness. The only thing that is driving me is self-satisfaction, self-validation.
author: William Clay Ford, Jr.

quote: If you ever find happiness by hunting for it, you will find it, as the old woman did her lost spectacles, safe on her own nose all the time.
author: Josh Billings

quote: Fashion is all about happiness. It's fun. It's important. But it's not medicine.
author: Donatella Versace

quote: Life is essentially a cheat and its conditions are those of defeat; the redeeming things are not happiness and pleasure but the deeper satisfactions that come out of struggle.
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quote: When what we are is what we want to be, that's happiness.
author: Malcolm Forbes

quote: Most of us believe in trying to make other people happy only if they can be happy in ways which we approve.
author: Robert Staughton Lynd

quote: Happiness always looks small while you hold it in your hands, but let it go, and you learn at once how big and precious it is.
author: Maxim Gorky

quote: The man who is aware of himself is henceforward independent; and he is never bored, and life is only too short, and he is steeped through and through with a profound yet temperate happiness.
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: As long as you are being true to yourself, you will always find happiness.
author: Amber Riley

quote: The secular world looks to the church and to its chagrin, finds no love, no life, no laughter, no hope and no happiness.
author: Rod Parsley

quote: I think the pursuit of happiness is the pursuit of reality because illusion never leaves us ultimately happy.
author: Parker Palmer

quote: We must have courage to bet on our ideas, to take the calculated risk, and to act. Everyday living requires courage if life is to be effective and bring happiness.
author: Maxwell Maltz

quote: No man is happy without a delusion of some kind. Delusions are as necessary to our happiness as realities.
author: Christian Nestell Bovee

quote: Part of the happiness of life consists not in fighting battles, but in avoiding them. A masterly retreat is in itself a victory.
author: Norman Vincent Peale

quote: Happiness, for me, is a function of the number of people I love, and I think joy and happiness is directly related to how many people are in our lives and how deeply we are bonded with those people.
author: Mitt Romney

quote: Man is fond of counting his troubles, but he does not count his joys. If he counted them up as he ought to, he would see that every lot has enough happiness provided for it.
author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

quote: As long as you understand that you find happiness through family, friends and love, then money is just a nice bonus.
author: Ioan Gruffudd

quote: Since our society equates happiness with youth, we often assume that sorrow, quiet desperation, and hopelessness go hand in hand with getting older. They don't. Emotional pain or numbness are symptoms of living the wrong life, not a long life.
author: Martha Beck

quote: Curiosity is one of the great secrets of happiness.
author: Bryant H. McGill

quote: The mantra that you're given in Transcendental Meditation you keep to yourself. The reason being, true happiness is not out there, true happiness lies within.
author: David Lynch

quote: True success, true happiness lies in freedom and fulfillment.
author: Dada Vaswani

quote: Happiness in intelligent people is the rarest thing I know.
author: Ernest Hemingway

quote: It is not God's will merely that we should be happy, but that we should make ourselves happy.
author: Immanuel Kant

quote: I might have some character traits that some might see as innocence or naive. That's because I discovered peace and happiness in my soul. And with this knowledge, I also see the beauty of human life.
author: Tobey Maguire

quote: The fabric of North Carolina and what makes our state so special is our families and our common desire for a brighter future for our children. No matter what your family looks like, we all want the same thing for our families - happiness, health, prosperity, a bright future for our children and grandchildren.
author: Kay Hagan

quote: Live by this credo: have a little laugh at life and look around you for happiness instead of sadness. Laughter has always brought me out of unhappy situations.
author: Red Skelton

quote: Happiness: a good bank account, a good cook, and a good digestion.
author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

quote: Life in common among people who love each other is the ideal of happiness.
author: George Sand

quote: Try to make at least one person happy every day. If you cannot do a kind deed, speak a kind word. If you cannot speak a kind word, think a kind thought. Count up, if you can, the treasure of happiness that you would dispense in a week, in a year, in a lifetime!
author: Lawrence G. Lovasik

quote: Remember happiness doesn't depend upon who you are or what you have; it depends solely on what you think.
author: Dale Carnegie

quote: More compassionate mind, more sense of concern for other's well-being, is source of happiness.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: Never permit a dichotomy to rule your life, a dichotomy in which you hate what you do so you can have pleasure in your spare time. Look for a situation in which your work will give you as much happiness as your spare time.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: One test of the correctness of educational procedure is the happiness of the child.
author: Maria Montessori

quote: There is no cosmetic for beauty like happiness.
author: Maria Mitchell

quote: Making money is a happiness. And that's a great incentive. Making other people happy is a super-happiness.
author: Muhammad Yunus

quote: My faith helps me understand that circumstances don't dictate my happiness, my inner peace.
author: Denzel Washington

quote: In times of joy, all of us wished we possessed a tail we could wag.
author: W. H. Auden

quote: One can make no better investment than the cultivation of a taste for the beautiful, for it will bring rainbow hues and enduring joys to the whole life. It will not only greatly increase one's capacity for happiness, but also one's efficiency.
author: Orison Swett Marden

quote: Happiness is the bomb cosmetic! When I'm smiling, sometimes I'm giving thanks for all the things I have rather than worrying about the things I don't.
author: Yaya DaCosta

quote: Only one thing has to change for us to know happiness in our lives: where we focus our attention.
author: Greg Anderson

quote: Success is getting and achieving what you want. Happiness is wanting and being content with what you get.
author: Bernard Meltzer

quote: Friendship improves happiness and abates misery, by the doubling of our joy and the dividing of our grief.
author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: Success is getting what you want. Happiness is liking what you get.
author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: I've made an odd discovery. Every time I talk to a savant I feel quite sure that happiness is no longer a possibility. Yet when I talk with my gardener, I'm convinced of the opposite.
author: Bertrand Russell

quote: Be more dedicated to making solid achievements than in running after swift but synthetic happiness.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: I have learned to seek my happiness by limiting my desires, rather than in attempting to satisfy them.
author: John Stuart Mill

quote: A table, a chair, a bowl of fruit and a violin; what else does a man need to be happy?
author: Albert Einstein

quote: The most worth-while thing is to try to put happiness into the lives of others.
author: Robert Baden-Powell

quote: The first requisite for the happiness of the people is the abolition of religion.
author: Karl Marx

quote: You do the right thing even if it makes you feel bad. The purpose of life is not to be happy but to be worthy of happiness.
author: Tracy Kidder

quote: Happiness is beneficial for the body, but it is grief that develops the powers of the mind.
author: Marcel Proust

quote: The true basis of morality is utility; that is, the adaptation of our actions to the promotion of the general welfare and happiness; the endeavour so to rule our lives that we may serve and bless mankind.
author: Annie Besant

quote: Happiness is within. It has nothing to do with how much applause you get or how many people praise you. Happiness comes when you believe that you have done something truly meaningful.
author: Martin Yan

quote: Independence is happiness.
author: Susan B. Anthony

quote: For happiness one needs security, but joy can spring like a flower even from the cliffs of despair.
author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quote: Happiness often sneaks in through a door you didn't know you left open.
author: John Barrymore

quote: Being happy is of the utmost importance. Success in anything is through happiness.
author: Maharishi Mahesh Yogi

quote: Being of service to others is what brings true happiness.
author: Marie Osmond

quote: It's OK to have a plan, to invest in your future - for your financial security, your love life, your personal fulfillment, and even your happiness. To have personal happiness as a stated goal doesn't detract from it if you get there.
author: Karen Finerman

quote: Some people think happiness is a luxury, but it's a necessity. You need to make space for it in your life.
author: Christie Brinkley

quote: Money can't buy you happiness, but it can buy you a yacht big enough to pull up right alongside it.
author: David Lee Roth

quote: We are buried beneath the weight of information, which is being confused with knowledge; quantity is being confused with abundance and wealth with happiness.
author: Tom Waits

quote: One of the first conditions of happiness is that the link between Man and Nature shall not be broken.
author: Leo Tolstoy

quote: Happiness is the only thing worth fighting for in your life.
author: Lilly Singh

quote: I'm a very positive person. My grandmother taught me that happiness is both a skill and a decision, and you are responsible for the outcome.
author: Helen McCrory

quote: There is only one happiness in this life, to love and be loved.
author: George Sand

quote: Happiness is not something you postpone for the future; it is something you design for the present.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Today I choose life. Every morning when I wake up I can choose joy, happiness, negativity, pain... To feel the freedom that comes from being able to continue to make mistakes and choices - today I choose to feel life, not to deny my humanity but embrace it.
author: Kevyn Aucoin

quote: Be happy for this moment. This moment is your life.
author: Omar Khayyam

quote: Happiness is a choice. You can choose to be happy. There's going to be stress in life, but it's your choice whether you let it affect you or not.
author: Valerie Bertinelli

quote: Some days are just bad days, that's all. You have to experience sadness to know happiness, and I remind myself that not every day is going to be a good day, that's just the way it is!
author: Dita Von Teese

quote: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.
author: Albert Schweitzer

quote: Let us never know what old age is. Let us know the happiness time brings, not count the years.
author: Ausonius

So if I were to wish for something else, it would just to be happy all the time, to have a superpower of not letting things affect me, and to be true to who I am, always.
author: Kylie Jenner

quote: Completeness? Happiness? These words don't come close to describing my emotions. There truly is nothing I can say to capture what motherhood means to me, particularly given my medical history.
author: Anita Baker

quote: Happiness is dependent on self-discipline. We are the biggest obstacles to our own happiness. It is much easier to do battle with society and with others than to fight our own nature.
author: Dennis Prager

quote: True happiness involves the full use of one's power and talents.
author: John W. Gardner

quote: If you are happy, you can give happiness. If you don't love yourself and if you are unhappy with yourself, you can't give anything else but that.
author: Gisele Bundchen

quote: When a small child, I thought that success spelled happiness. I was wrong, happiness is like a butterfly which appears and delights us for one brief moment, but soon flits away.
author: Anna Pavlova

quote: A happy life must be to a great extent a quiet life, for it is only in an atmosphere of quiet that true joy dare live.
author: Bertrand Russell

quote: God cannot give us a happiness and peace apart from Himself, because it is not there. There is no such thing.
author: C. S. Lewis

quote: We never taste happiness in perfection, our most fortunate successes are mixed with sadness.
author: Pierre Corneille

quote: It's not possible to experience constant euphoria, but if you're grateful, you can find happiness in everything.
author: Pharrell Williams

quote: We all want to help one another. Human beings are like that. We want to live by each other's happiness, not by each other's misery.
author: Charlie Chaplin

quote: In a storm of struggles, I have tried to control the elements, clasp the fist tight so as to protect self and happiness. But stress can be an addiction, and worry can be our lunge for control, and we forget the answer to this moment is always yes because of Christ.
author: Ann Voskamp

quote: It is very important to generate a good attitude, a good heart, as much as possible. From this, happiness in both the short term and the long term for both yourself and others will come.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: True happiness comes from the joy of deeds well done, the zest of creating things new.
author: Antoine de Saint-Exupery

quote: To me, flowers are happiness.
author: Stefano Gabbana

quote: Happiness is only real when shared.
author: Christopher McCandless

quote: The said truth is that it is the greatest happiness of the greatest number that is the measure of right and wrong.
author: Jeremy Bentham

quote: No man chooses evil because it is evil; he only mistakes it for happiness, the good he seeks.
author: Mary Wollstonecraft

quote: Although the skills aren't hard to learn, finding the happiness and finding the satisfaction and finding fulfillment in continuously serving somebody else something good to eat, is what makes a really good restaurant.
author: Mario Batali

quote: The white man's happiness cannot be purchased by the black man's misery.
author: Frederick Douglass

quote: A great man does not seek applause or place; he seeks for truth; he seeks the road to happiness, and what he ascertains, he gives to others.
author: Robert Green Ingersoll

quote: Happiness is nothing but temporary moments here and there - and I love those. But I would be bored out of my mind if I were happy all the time.
author: Zoe Saldana

quote: When you're happy you find pure joy in your life. There are no regrets in this state of happiness - and that's a goal worth striving for in all areas of your life.
author: Suze Orman

quote: Love is trembling happiness.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: It was as if all of the happiness, all of the magic of this blissful hour had flowed together into these stirring, bittersweet tones and flowed away, becoming temporal and transitory once more.
author: Herman Hesse

quote: I keep mementos from everything I've done. I've got my cab driver's license from 'Happiness.' I've got a pair of glasses and a belt buckle from playing John Lennon. I've got a pair of sunglasses from playing Andy Warhol... It's all in a box in the garage.
author: Jared Harris

quote: As a teenager, rather than setting myself on a course to pursue fame (quite common growing up in L.A., the entertainment capital of the world), happiness, fulfillment, and spiritual enlightenment (also quite common), I skipped right on to trying to be successful. 'Let's just get on with it,' I felt. 'Onward' became my motto.
author: Karen Finerman

quote: What we call happiness in the strictest sense comes from the (preferably sudden) satisfaction of needs which have been dammed up to a high degree.
author: Sigmund Freud

quote: Joe E. Lewis said, 'Money doesn't buy happiness but it calms the nerves.' And that is how I feel about a film being well-received.
author: Alexander Payne

quote: Just as a cautious businessman avoids investing all his capital in one concern, so wisdom would probably admonish us also not to anticipate all our happiness from one quarter alone.
author: Sigmund Freud

quote: Life finds its purpose and fulfillment in the expansion of happiness.
author: Maharishi Mahesh Yogi

quote: In the scope of a happy life, a messy desk or an overstuffed coat closet is a trivial thing, yet I find - and I hear from other people that they agree - that getting rid of clutter gives a disproportionate boost to happiness.
author: Gretchen Rubin

quote: I wish I could throw off the thoughts which poison my happiness, but I take a kind of pleasure in indulging them.
author: Frederic Chopin

quote: I think you can be depressed and flourish, I think you can have cancer and flourish, I think you can be divorced and flourish. When we believed that happiness was only smiling and good mood, that wasn't very good for people like me, people in the lower half of positive affectivity.
author: Martin Seligman

quote: It is the true duty of every man to promote the happiness of his fellow creatures to the utmost of his power.
author: William Wilberforce

quote: Happiness is like a cat, If you try to coax it or call it, it will avoid you; it will never come. But if you pay not attention to it and go about your business, you'll find it rubbing against your legs and jumping into your lap.
author: William Bennett

quote: I'm not motivated by money or power or fame. In the end, it doesn't bring much happiness. The only thing that is driving me is self-satisfaction, self-validation.
author: William Clay Ford, Jr.

quote: If you ever find happiness by hunting for it, you will find it, as the old woman did her lost spectacles, safe on her own nose all the time.
author: Josh Billings

quote: Fashion is all about happiness. It's fun. It's important. But it's not medicine.
author: Donatella Versace

quote: Life is essentially a cheat and its conditions are those of defeat; the redeeming things are not happiness and pleasure but the deeper satisfactions that come out of struggle.
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quote: When what we are is what we want to be, that's happiness.
author: Malcolm Forbes

quote: Most of us believe in trying to make other people happy only if they can be happy in ways which we approve.
author: Robert Staughton Lynd

quote: Happiness always looks small while you hold it in your hands, but let it go, and you learn at once how big and precious it is.
author: Maxim Gorky

quote: The man who is aware of himself is henceforward independent; and he is never bored, and life is only too short, and he is steeped through and through with a profound yet temperate happiness.
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: As long as you are being true to yourself, you will always find happiness.
author: Amber Riley

quote: The secular world looks to the church and to its chagrin, finds no love, no life, no laughter, no hope and no happiness.
author: Rod Parsley

quote: I think the pursuit of happiness is the pursuit of reality because illusion never leaves us ultimately happy.
author: Parker Palmer

quote: We must have courage to bet on our ideas, to take the calculated risk, and to act. Everyday living requires courage if life is to be effective and bring happiness.
author: Maxwell Maltz

quote: No man is happy without a delusion of some kind. Delusions are as necessary to our happiness as realities.
author: Christian Nestell Bovee

quote: Part of the happiness of life consists not in fighting battles, but in avoiding them. A masterly retreat is in itself a victory.
author: Norman Vincent Peale

quote: Happiness, for me, is a function of the number of people I love, and I think joy and happiness is directly related to how many people are in our lives and how deeply we are bonded with those people.
author: Mitt Romney

quote: Man is fond of counting his troubles, but he does not count his joys. If he counted them up as he ought to, he would see that every lot has enough happiness provided for it.
author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

quote: As long as you understand that you find happiness through family, friends and love, then money is just a nice bonus.
author: Ioan Gruffudd

quote: Since our society equates happiness with youth, we often assume that sorrow, quiet desperation, and hopelessness go hand in hand with getting older. They don't. Emotional pain or numbness are symptoms of living the wrong life, not a long life.
author: Martha Beck

quote: Curiosity is one of the great secrets of happiness.
author: Bryant H. McGill

quote: The mantra that you're given in Transcendental Meditation you keep to yourself. The reason being, true happiness is not out there, true happiness lies within.
author: David Lynch

quote: True success, true happiness lies in freedom and fulfillment.
author: Dada Vaswani

quote: Happiness in intelligent people is the rarest thing I know.
author: Ernest Hemingway

quote: It is not God's will merely that we should be happy, but that we should make ourselves happy.
author: Immanuel Kant

quote: I might have some character traits that some might see as innocence or naive. That's because I discovered peace and happiness in my soul. And with this knowledge, I also see the beauty of human life.
author: Tobey Maguire

quote: The fabric of North Carolina and what makes our state so special is our families and our common desire for a brighter future for our children. No matter what your family looks like, we all want the same thing for our families - happiness, health, prosperity, a bright future for our children and grandchildren.
author: Kay Hagan

quote: Live by this credo: have a little laugh at life and look around you for happiness instead of sadness. Laughter has always brought me out of unhappy situations.
author: Red Skelton

quote: Happiness: a good bank account, a good cook, and a good digestion.
author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

quote: Life in common among people who love each other is the ideal of happiness.
author: George Sand

quote: Try to make at least one person happy every day. If you cannot do a kind deed, speak a kind word. If you cannot speak a kind word, think a kind thought. Count up, if you can, the treasure of happiness that you would dispense in a week, in a year, in a lifetime!
author: Lawrence G. Lovasik

quote: Remember happiness doesn't depend upon who you are or what you have; it depends solely on what you think.
author: Dale Carnegie

quote: More compassionate mind, more sense of concern for other's well-being, is source of happiness.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: Never permit a dichotomy to rule your life, a dichotomy in which you hate what you do so you can have pleasure in your spare time. Look for a situation in which your work will give you as much happiness as your spare time.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: One test of the correctness of educational procedure is the happiness of the child.
author: Maria Montessori

quote: There is no cosmetic for beauty like happiness.
author: Maria Mitchell

quote: Making money is a happiness. And that's a great incentive. Making other people happy is a super-happiness.
author: Muhammad Yunus

quote: My faith helps me understand that circumstances don't dictate my happiness, my inner peace.
author: Denzel Washington

quote: In times of joy, all of us wished we possessed a tail we could wag.
author: W. H. Auden

quote: One can make no better investment than the cultivation of a taste for the beautiful, for it will bring rainbow hues and enduring joys to the whole life. It will not only greatly increase one's capacity for happiness, but also one's efficiency.
author: Orison Swett Marden

quote: Happiness is the bomb cosmetic! When I'm smiling, sometimes I'm giving thanks for all the things I have rather than worrying about the things I don't.
author: Yaya DaCosta

quote: The happiness of the bee and the dolphin is to exist. For man it is to know that and to wonder at it.
author: Jacques Yves Cousteau

quote: Happiness held is the seed; Happiness shared is the flower.
author: John Harrigan

quote: Happiness is when what you think, what you say, and what you do are in harmony.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Perfect happiness is a beautiful sunset, the giggle of a grandchild, the first snowfall. It's the little things that make happy moments, not the grand events. Joy comes in sips, not gulps.
author: Sharon Draper

quote: I do believe that if you haven't learnt about sadness, you cannot appreciate happiness.
author: Nana Mouskouri

quote: Red is such an interesting color to correlate with emotion, because it's on both ends of the spectrum. On one end you have happiness, falling in love, infatuation with someone, passion, all that. On the other end, you've got obsession, jealousy, danger, fear, anger and frustration.
author: Taylor Swift

quote: I am determined to be cheerful and happy in whatever situation I may find myself. For I have learned that the greater part of our misery or unhappiness is determined not by our circumstance but by our disposition.
author: Martha Washington

quote: Happiness does not come from doing easy work but from the afterglow of satisfaction that comes after the achievement of a difficult task that demanded our best.
author: Theodore Isaac Rubin

quote: I just want to say to women, 'Be yourself - it's the inner beauty that counts. You are your own best friend, the key to your own happiness, and as soon as you understand that - and it takes a few heartbreaks - you can be happy.'
author: Cherie Lunghi

quote: Happiness is a butterfly, which when pursued, is always just beyond your grasp, but which, if you will sit down quietly, may alight upon you.
author: Nathaniel Hawthorne

quote: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: Poetry comes from the highest happiness or the deepest sorrow.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: Whoever said money can't buy happiness simply didn't know where to go shopping.
author: Bo Derek

quote: Crying is cleansing. There's a reason for tears, happiness or sadness.
author: Dionne Warwick

quote: A mother's happiness is like a beacon, lighting up the future but reflected also on the past in the guise of fond memories.
author: Honore de Balzac

quote: If you want to be happy, be.
author: Leo Tolstoy

quote: Remember that the happiest people are not those getting more, but those giving more.
author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: Happiness, true happiness, is an inner quality. It is a state of mind. If your mind is at peace, you are happy. If your mind is at peace, but you have nothing else, you can be happy. If you have everything the world can give - pleasure, possessions, power - but lack peace of mind, you can never be happy.
author: Dada Vaswani

quote: Love is the master key that opens the gates of happiness, of hatred, of jealousy, and, most easily of all, the gate of fear.
author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.

quote: I don't have to chase extraordinary moments to find happiness - it's right in front of me if I'm paying attention and practicing gratitude.
author: Brene Brown

quote: Joy is prayer; joy is strength: joy is love; joy is a net of love by which you can catch souls.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: True happiness is... to enjoy the present, without anxious dependence upon the future.
author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: I get way too much happiness from good food.
author: Elizabeth Olsen

quote: The true secret of happiness lies in taking a genuine interest in all the details of daily life.
author: William Morris

quote: If you want others to be happy, practice compassion. If you want to be happy, practice compassion.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: You take away all the other luxuries in life, and if you can make someone smile and laugh, you have given the most special gift: happiness.
author: Brad Garrett

quote: Only one thing has to change for us to know happiness in our lives: where we focus our attention.
author: Greg Anderson

quote: Success is getting and achieving what you want. Happiness is wanting and being content with what you get.
author: Bernard Meltzer

quote: Friendship improves happiness and abates misery, by the doubling of our joy and the dividing of our grief.
author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: Success is getting what you want. Happiness is liking what you get.
author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: I've made an odd discovery. Every time I talk to a savant I feel quite sure that happiness is no longer a possibility. Yet when I talk with my gardener, I'm convinced of the opposite.
author: Bertrand Russell

quote: Be more dedicated to making solid achievements than in running after swift but synthetic happiness.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: I have learned to seek my happiness by limiting my desires, rather than in attempting to satisfy them.
author: John Stuart Mill

quote: A table, a chair, a bowl of fruit and a violin; what else does a man need to be happy?
author: Albert Einstein

quote: The most worth-while thing is to try to put happiness into the lives of others.
author: Robert Baden-Powell

quote: The first requisite for the happiness of the people is the abolition of religion.
author: Karl Marx

quote: You do the right thing even if it makes you feel bad. The purpose of life is not to be happy but to be worthy of happiness.
author: Tracy Kidder

quote: Happiness is beneficial for the body, but it is grief that develops the powers of the mind.
author: Marcel Proust

quote: The true basis of morality is utility; that is, the adaptation of our actions to the promotion of the general welfare and happiness; the endeavour so to rule our lives that we may serve and bless mankind.
author: Annie Besant

quote: Happiness is within. It has nothing to do with how much applause you get or how many people praise you. Happiness comes when you believe that you have done something truly meaningful.
author: Martin Yan

quote: Independence is happiness.
author: Susan B. Anthony

quote: For happiness one needs security, but joy can spring like a flower even from the cliffs of despair.
author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quote: Happiness often sneaks in through a door you didn't know you left open.
author: John Barrymore

quote: Being happy is of the utmost importance. Success in anything is through happiness.
author: Maharishi Mahesh Yogi

quote: Being of service to others is what brings true happiness.
author: Marie Osmond

quote: It's OK to have a plan, to invest in your future - for your financial security, your love life, your personal fulfillment, and even your happiness. To have personal happiness as a stated goal doesn't detract from it if you get there.
author: Karen Finerman

quote: Some people think happiness is a luxury, but it's a necessity. You need to make space for it in your life.
author: Christie Brinkley

quote: Money can't buy you happiness, but it can buy you a yacht big enough to pull up right alongside it.
author: David Lee Roth

quote: We are buried beneath the weight of information, which is being confused with knowledge; quantity is being confused with abundance and wealth with happiness.
author: Tom Waits

quote: One of the first conditions of happiness is that the link between Man and Nature shall not be broken.
author: Leo Tolstoy

quote: Happiness is the only thing worth fighting for in your life.
author: Lilly Singh

quote: I'm a very positive person. My grandmother taught me that happiness is both a skill and a decision, and you are responsible for the outcome.
author: Helen McCrory

quote: There is only one happiness in this life, to love and be loved.
author: George Sand

quote: Happiness is not something you postpone for the future; it is something you design for the present.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Today I choose life. Every morning when I wake up I can choose joy, happiness, negativity, pain... To feel the freedom that comes from being able to continue to make mistakes and choices - today I choose to feel life, not to deny my humanity but embrace it.
author: Kevyn Aucoin

quote: Be happy for this moment. This moment is your life.
author: Omar Khayyam

quote: Happiness is a choice. You can choose to be happy. There's going to be stress in life, but it's your choice whether you let it affect you or not.
author: Valerie Bertinelli

quote: Some days are just bad days, that's all. You have to experience sadness to know happiness, and I remind myself that not every day is going to be a good day, that's just the way it is!
author: Dita Von Teese

quote: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.
author: Albert Schweitzer

quote: Let us never know what old age is. Let us know the happiness time brings, not count the years.
author: Ausonius

quote: To enjoy good health, to bring true happiness to one's family, to bring peace to all, one must first discipline and control one's own mind. If a man can control his mind he can find the way to Enlightenment, and all wisdom and virtue will naturally come to him.
author: Buddha

quote: The best way to pay for a lovely moment is to enjoy it.
author: Richard Bach

quote: Friends show their love in times of trouble, not in happiness.
author: Euripides

quote: A smile is happiness you'll find right under your nose.
author: Tom Wilson

quote: Thousands of candles can be lighted from a single candle, and the life of the candle will not be shortened. Happiness never decreases by being shared.
author: Buddha

quote: Happiness lies in the joy of achievement and the thrill of creative effort.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: The secret to happiness is freedom... And the secret to freedom is courage.
author: Thucydides

quote: Every day is a new day, and you'll never be able to find happiness if you don't move on.
author: Carrie Underwood

quote: Every day we have plenty of opportunities to get angry, stressed or offended. But what you're doing when you indulge these negative emotions is giving something outside yourself power over your happiness. You can choose to not let little things upset you.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: Happiness radiates like the fragrance from a flower and draws all good things towards you.
author: Maharishi Mahesh Yogi

quote: Happiness is having a large, loving, caring, close-knit family in another city.
author: George Burns

quote: Love is when the other person's happiness is more important than your own.
author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: Happiness cannot be traveled to, owned, earned, worn or consumed. Happiness is the spiritual experience of living every minute with love, grace, and gratitude.
author: Denis Waitley

quote: The most simple things can bring the most happiness.
author: Izabella Scorupco

quote: Happiness doesn't depend on any external conditions, it is governed by our mental attitude.
author: Dale Carnegie

quote: My greatest beauty secret is being happy with myself. I don't use special creams or treatments - I'll use a little bit of everything. It's a mistake to think you are what you put on yourself.
